title: google pay and other transaction app dont work on Pixel 3a
content:
So here the problem, from my understanding pixel phone have nfc transaction , by transaction i mean that the phone can transmit signal and not only read

I had a pop up that offered me to download google pay , so i went on it redirects me to google play , hold and behold Google play says the phone is not compatible which is weird.
Went and download a different app , called cards (allow u to clone ur bus card / credit card and more) didn't work either.


I made sure nfc was enable in the settings 

So, whats going on
